name: 2static
description: Super Simple Site generator for dariomac.com. Inspired by https://github.com/AVGP/susi

scripts.build: find . -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete && node builder.js data/ www/ layouts/ --clear-all
scripts.build-all: npm run build-notes && npm run build
scripts.deploy: timeout 15 bash -c 'while [[ "$(curl -s -o /dev/null -X OPTIONS -w ''%{http_code}'' https://dariomac.com/pullit)" != "204" ]]; do sleep 1; done'
scripts.build-debug: LOG_LEVEL=debug NODE_ENV=development node --inspect builder.js data/ www/ layouts/ --clear-all
scripts.findup: echo && find data/*/assets -maxdepth 1 -type f -printf '%f\n' | sort | uniq -d | xargs -I[filename] -n1 sh -c "find data/ -name [filename] -printf 'data/%P\n' && echo"
scripts.update-searcher: rm -rf assets/build && cp -r ../dm-searcher/build/ assets/build && rm assets/build/inventory.json

author: Dario Macchi <dariomac@gmail.com>
